thread.title: Meigs County High School vs. Brainerd High School
thread.title_full: Meigs County High School vs. Brainerd High School

title: Meigs County High School vs. Brainerd High School
text: Share Updated: 10/03 12:49 am Chattanooga, TN (WDEF) - Picking up the action in the 3rd Quarter at Brainerd finds the home stands mostly empty.Quarterback Malik Beavers almost tosses one right into the hands of Meigs defender Donell Armour, but he's unable to hold onto it. Beavers to Robert Evans for a big gain right up the middle.A few plays later, Beavers hands it to Evans again, who evades tackles, our cameraman, and more tackles, and finally breaks free into the end zone after a 30 yard run. Panthers up 21-7.The cheerleaders call the team to continue to HUSTLE!Fourth quarter, Panthers still on the move as Beavers with the keeper gets big yardage and another 1st down. Brainerd wins 21 to 9.
